item.author: opoyserc@gmail.com (Obryan Poyser)
item.description: In the new age of information, the common wisdom dictates that people acquire and validate cues that endorse their prejudices. item.title: Save with time stamp
item.author: opoyserc@gmail.com (Obryan Poyser)
item.description: Oftenly I have to deal with modifications of a scraping code, whose outcomes change or are subject to errors. Hence, I found useful to have a way to create versions of a data frame, this is a made savts. This simple yet useful function creates csv file with time stamp.
